message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item to you for $130. I think you'll find it's a great deal at this price.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $120 is too low for me.  Would you consider $125?
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $125, but I was thinking more along the lines of $115. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
